If NL and new debtor we check if we have DEBC/DEBH and (if not) we create it ...
Check if we do already have this DEBTOR in DB and create DEBC/DEBH if not ....
fill DCLN which is a temporary data structure evaluated by BDC200 ...
Now call BDC200 to check if we do already have a debtor with this information ..
If not, BDC will create DEBH anbd DEBC ....
Due to a bug (?) BDC200 may not have created DHSH (search word records) for the
newly created DEBTOR_HELLER. We check if this is the case and if yes, we call
BDH005 explicitely
if there was no match, we need to delete the temp. DCLN row ourselfes ...

to table TDCN (TEMP_DEBTOR_CLIENT_NEW)

SQL_STMT_U.val: insert into :1/TDCN select * from :2/DCLN where DCLN_NO=:3

Text.val: DSQL task to log a failed BDC200 request to temp. table TDCN for debugging
check if there's a INVO record for data user entered
Check if there's a SCHI row for entered invoice
Use BDH001 to check for valid zipcode format
Note: We do set an error in table ICMI here. BDH001 will be called from ICA502 M
to ouput a proper error message.
Save entered values to ICMI so that we can prefill the entry screen
in ICA502 ManInvDebValShow which is called if validation fails
